titleStmt.title: The grand-jury-man's oath and office explained, and the rights of English-men asserted a dialogue between a barrister at law and a grand-jury man.
titleStmt.author: Hawles, John, Sir, 1645-1716.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Sir John Hawles. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
